title: Dracula Vol. 3
description: DRACULA~BOOK 3...THE VERY BEGINNING OF THE STORY!DRACULA~ a vampire who had died in the year of 1865...possessing his romantic tale how he created LANA BLACK, which he had written and left behind!With DRACULA'S deep words of CONFESSION, OBSESSION, THEATRE, ENTERTAINMENT, PLEASURE AND PAIN...will ensure the mature reader an intimate emotional read, and promises to arouse one's every bone!Read DRACULA'S last words "TILL DEATH DO US PART"...his imprint, while he took with him but a deep dark secret! A secret he had 'TAKEN TO THE GRAVE'!
author: Danielle Gianni
